title: Sutherland Springs Families, Survivors Seek Bigger Payments From Government
sub_head: Damages proposed for failure to stop shooter from buying gun used in 2017 Texas massacre are below those in Charleston, S.C., and Parkland, Fla., shootings
body:
Lawyers for victims of the 2017 massacre in Sutherland Springs, Texas, argued Monday that the Justice Department was proposing too little in damages, compared with other recent settlements over the governmentâ€™s failure to prevent mass shootings.
